member.name: M:web_api_crud.Controllers.StudentApiController.GetStudents
member.summary: Get All Student Data
member.returns: 200 OK with a list of student data if students are found. 404 Not Found if no students are found.

member.name: M:web_api_crud.Controllers.StudentApiController.GetStudentsById(System.String)
member.summary: Get the Particular Data Of Student by their Respective
member.param: The ID of the student to retrieve.
member.returns: 200 OK with the student data if the student is found. 404 Not Found if the student with the given ID is not found.

member.name: M:web_api_crud.Controllers.StudentApiController.CreateStudent(web_api_crud.Models.Student)
member.summary: Create a New Student with Data
member.returns: 201 Created if the student is successfully created. 400 Bad Request if there are validation errors or other issues with the request.

member.name: M:web_api_crud.Controllers.StudentApiController.UpdateStudent(System.String,web_api_crud.Models.Student)
member.summary: Update the Data of Existing Student by
member.param: The ID of the student to update.
member.returns: 200 OK if the student is successfully updated. 400 Bad Request if the provided ID in the URL does not match the student's ID.

member.name: M:web_api_crud.Controllers.StudentApiController.DeleteStudent(System.String)
member.summary: Delete Student Data By
member.param: The ID of the student to delete.
member.returns: 200 OK if the student is successfully deleted. 404 Not Found if the student with the given ID is not found.
